item.title: Shinkai: A Subnautica Multiplayer Mod
item.description:
Shinkai (深海) is a multiplayer mod for the game Subnautica. It is open source and available on GitHub.

The mod was tested on the March update of the game (Update 84), but it seems to work with the April build as well. I have personally verified that the game was playable from beginning to completion with 3 friends online, but there isn’t any explicit limit. As far as a feature list goes, most of the single player experience carries over to multiplayer the way you would expect it to.

item.title: Video Playback for Games with VP9
item.description: When working on porting an older PC game to a modern version of Windows I needed play its prerecorded videos in-game. Commercial engines (Unity, UE4) include this functionality, and there are also standalone solutions Bink that can work for a custom engine. I wasn’t interested in licensing a commercial product, so I developed my own video player.
